results.title: Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis following cyclosporine treatment for uveitis.
results.text_hl: A 69-year-old female with chronic @<m>DISEASE_Uveitis_Posterior</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015866 @@@posterior uveitis@@@ was treated with @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@cyclosporine@@@ while on concomitant oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Lasocki A, Vote B, Fassett R, Zamir E. Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis following cyclosporine treatment for uveitis. Ocul Immunol Inflamm. 2007 Jul-Aug;15(4):345-6. PMID: 17763133
